about.p1h: Artists and intellects have been writing and rewriting the future for years
about.p1t: Their curiosity about today drove them to insights about the way we would live, move, and connect in the future.
about.p2h: They dared to be wrong because they had a vision and a medium.
about.p2t: They also dared to be right, because they were not afraid of change, inspiring new ideas, or challenging the mode of the moment.
about.p3h: We are ignited by the possibilities that inspired those written futures. The studies of humanity that have advanced experience. The imaginative ideas that have inspired new innovations. The relentless inventiveness that has transformed communication.
about.p3t: We will dare to be wrong because we are inspired by what we do not know. We will also dare to be right because we are excited about the future.
about.p4t: The future is our fuel because with every idea, we have an opportunity to write it. Together.
